text:
Fibonacci levels help you see where momentum pauses by mapping potential areas of support & resistance using ratios from the Fib sequence.  

I find them useful because strong trends often consolidate at these levels before continuing higher & this list reflects names consolidating between the 0.382  & 0.618 extension levels.

Former $GOOGL CEO Eric Schmidt says ‚Äúwe‚Äôre running out of electricity‚Äù noting  U.S. needs ~92 GW of new power versus ~1.5 GW per nuclear plant which frames the scale of the problem.

The real bottleneck for AI is power and hyperscalers are now racing for GW-scale energy.

$AMZN has built the third-largest advertising business in the world.

Now running at an ~$85B revenue run-rate and still growing ~23% YoY.

Mark Cuban says the next major job wave is customized AI integration for SMBs.

As software becomes tailored to each company‚Äôs workflow, someone has to build and maintain it across the ~33M businesses in the U.S.
This reads as $NVDA 26x forward earnings with 53% revenue growth and 56% earnings growth

People confuse gains with store of value.  They do not understand what ‚Äústore of value‚Äù means.

By definition B*it coin is the furthest thing from it.

In reality, nothing is a true store of value.  Some things come close (the things maxis hate most), but nothing 100%.
